feed.title: cpprefjp - C++日本語リファレンス

entry.title: count -- Created version column for reference/algorithm/count.md
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/algorithm/count.md b/reference/algorithm/count.md
index afedd7ede..d8ae4e993 100644
--- a/reference/algorithm/count.md
+++ b/reference/algorithm/count.md
@@ -72,6 +72,15 @@ typename iterator_traits<InputIterator>::difference_type
 }
 ```
 
+## バージョン
+### 言語
+- C++98
+
+### 処理系
+- [Clang](/implementation.md#clang): 14.0.6 [mark verified]
+- [GCC](/implementation.md#gcc): 9.5.0 [mark verified]
+- [ICC](/implementation.md#icc): ??
+- [Visual C++](/implementation.md#visual_cpp): ??
 
 ## 参照
 - [P0202R3 Add Constexpr Modifiers to Functions in `<algorithm>` and `<utility>` Headers](http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2017/p0202r3.html)

 ```
